html: Today, the U.S. is facing major environmental crises from deforestation, pollution, loss of biodiversity, and climate change. With recent attacks on our environment, we must remember we don't have to choose between protecting our natural treasures & creating jobs. We can do both.

html: From 1933 to 1942, the CCC employed over 3 million Americans, planted 3.5 billion trees, built countless miles of public trails and roadways, and constructed over 800 parks that Americans enjoy to this day.

html: Today, I am introducing legislation to reinstate and expand Glass-Steagall. The Return to Prudent Banking Act will separate commercial and investment banks and prevent banks from gambling away Americans’ hard-earned money on Wall Street.pic.twitter.com/wbqfJRzPRU
text:
Today, I am introducing legislation to reinstate and expand Glass-Steagall.

The Return to Prudent Banking Act will separate commercial and investment banks and prevent banks from gambling away Americans’ hard-earned money on Wall Street.pic.twitter.com/wbqfJRzPRU

html: I urge my colleagues to join me in passing this vital legislation so we can ensure the security and stability of our financial system.
text: I urge my colleagues to join me in passing this vital legislation so we can ensure the security and stability of our financial system.

html: Women take home less money than they have rightfully earned in every industry, no matter their job, their level of education, or location. Not only is this a matter of basic equality and economic justice, it is also a significant issue impacting women’s retirement security.
text: Women take home less money than they have rightfully earned in every industry, no matter their job, their level of education, or location. Not only is this a matter of basic equality and economic justice, it is also a significant issue impacting women’s retirement security.

html: American women lag far behind fair pay for equal work. Women working full-time, year-round, are paid only 80¢ for every dollar paid to their male counterparts. The pay gaps are more severe for women of color: 61¢ for African American women and 53¢ for Latina women.pic.twitter.com/KSTVB54mL0

--$1.5 trillion from Medicaid
--$845 billion from Medicare
--$25 billion from Social Security

He'd rather keep the nation focused on his feud with the deceased than his agenda.

text: I thank our veterans’ service organizations, including @AmericanLegion and @PVA1946, for supporting the VET HP Act and look forward to working with my colleagues in the Senate to advance the VETS HP Act to the President’s desk without delay.http://bit.ly/2tSXyAR

html: The bill prioritizes students in medically underserved areas, first-generation college students, students referred by minority-serving institutions, and veterans, narrowing the professional gap and ensuring we train pre-med students in careers that are in demand & necessary.
text: The bill prioritizes students in medically underserved areas, first-generation college students, students referred by minority-serving institutions, and veterans, narrowing the professional gap and ensuring we train pre-med students in careers that are in demand & necessary.

html: The VET HP Act creates a pilot program for pre-med students specializing in health professions where there is an identified staffing shortage and allows them to gain clinical observation experience at one of five pilot VA centers.
text: The VET HP Act creates a pilot program for pre-med students specializing in health professions where there is an identified staffing shortage and allows them to gain clinical observation experience at one of five pilot VA centers.

html: Owner Jera Stewart started baking at age 9 & hasn’t stopped since. Jera gained recognition in the community by selling baked goods at festivals & food trucks. In 2012, she became a licensed home bakery & in 2017 Jera’s Heavenly Sweet opened in the One SeaGate building in Toledo.

html: Since 1941, Toledoans have not only built Jeep into one of the most popular vehicle brands in the world, but also into a household name synonymous w/ American grit, determination, & ingenuity. Jeep is in our soul. It’s our tradition & we want to see it succeed far into the future
text: Since 1941, Toledoans have not only built Jeep into one of the most popular vehicle brands in the world, but also into a household name synonymous w/ American grit, determination, & ingenuity. Jeep is in our soul. It’s our tradition & we want to see it succeed far into the future

html: With rapidly changing driver preferences toward electric and other environmentally friendly alternatives, Jeep’s domestic investment in vehicle electrification is critical, especially as SUV’s and trucks become American consumers’ vehicle of choice.
text: With rapidly changing driver preferences toward electric and other environmentally friendly alternatives, Jeep’s domestic investment in vehicle electrification is critical, especially as SUV’s and trucks become American consumers’ vehicle of choice.

html: While electric drivetrain components will be built in Michigan, FCA’s investment in electrification will almost certainly benefit Jeep’s production platform and vehicles produced in nearby Toledo, such as the Wrangler and the upcoming Gladiator pickup truck.
text: While electric drivetrain components will be built in Michigan, FCA’s investment in electrification will almost certainly benefit Jeep’s production platform and vehicles produced in nearby Toledo, such as the Wrangler and the upcoming Gladiator pickup truck.

html: This #FarmBill provides stability to our farmers and businesses and fortifies our commitment to protecting our environment and makes sure that families, especially kids who are struggling, don’t go hungry. My statement on House passage of the Farm Bill:https://kaptur.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/kaptur-statement-house-passage-bipartisan-farm-bill …
